programme.title: Life Song

programme.desc: The adventures of the three bear brothers, Grizzly, Panda, and Ice Bear, as they try to fit in among the human world and make friends with the humans while searching for food and shelter.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1
programme.desc: A young boy finds a device resembling a watch that can transform him into 10 different alien creatures.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Armed with their superpowers and extra cuteness, Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup continue to save the day from all the evil plans the bad guys are intending for Townsville.

programme.title: Ekans - Snakes Awake
programme.desc: The events revolve around a smart thirteen-year-old boy named Ekans, who acquires a supernatural power that gives him the ability to control snakes. Using modern technology, he is able to confront villains and keep his city safe.

programme.title: Portreh
programme.desc: On the recommendation of his father's former sweetheart, Hazem becomes the editor-in-chief of an economic magazine. As he falls in love with Rima, the niece of his father's ex, trouble soon follows since an old feud has Hazem's parents and Rima at odds over the history with Randa.

programme.title: Eursan akhar zman
programme.desc: In each episode of the series, a groom proposes to marry Hikmat, the beautiful, educated young woman, who holds a doctorate in pharmacy and owns a pharmacy in the capital. As she comes from a well-off family, she is not in a hurry to choose a suitor from among the many men who ask for her hand.

programme.title: Return My Morning
programme.desc: Love brings together a successful man, Nabil, who has been searching for love a lot, and Raneem. Throughout the series, we see their extremely romantic story and also monitor their attitudes and interactions with their social surroundings.

programme.title: Sihr El Sharq
programme.desc: The series revolves around an English lady called Jane Digby,who's deeply fascinated by the East. She marries Sheikh Majool Al - Musallab ,who is a Badawi tribe leader and loves him dearly.

programme.title: Torjoman El-Ashwak
programme.desc: The show tells the story of three friends who decide to adopt the left-wing ideology. After each goes their way, one of them starts taking up Sufism and one maintains his leftist principles, which gets him into a lot of trouble. The third one decides to leave Syria, but returns after the civil war to find his missing daughter.

programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

He returns to his village after his discharge from military service, only to find himself facing Nawras Pasha and his strong influence and authority.

programme.title: Kamel El Adad

programme.title: 30 Youm
programme.desc: Tarek Helmy is a young married psychiatrist who has a daughter named Farida. On her first birthday, a patient called Tawfiq Al-Masry comes to Tarek, explaining to him an experiment he wants to carry out: he will pick someone, "The Chosen", and put him through a cycle of self-destructive crises over thirty days.

programme.title: Al-Heiba
programme.desc: Alia lives with her husband and their son in a European country. When the husband dies, she returns to Lebanon to bury him, only to discover that his family wants to take her son away, unless she marries his brother Jabal. She also discovers that her husband's family are arms smugglers.

programme.title: Flight of Dreams
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab, however, as the family dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Bab Al-Reih
programme.desc: Addressing the issue of the widespread violence that has taken over society, the series tells the story of a mailman who struggles with the fact that written mail is no longer being used, as he balances his professional struggles with the love he has for his family, especially his blind daughter.

programme.title: Bayn qalbayn
programme.desc: A romantic social drama that deals with the love story of the girl Ariam, who defended her love against the tough conditions she's living in at the time. She fell in love with Bashar despite being married to another.

programme.title: Nasibi Wa Qesmetik
programme.desc: Connected but separate episodes dealing with 15 different topics, divided into 3 episodes each topic, discussing the relationship between men and women, the problems that occur between them, and how they can be overcome.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: New: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Dewch i gwrdd â'r criw printio - Melyn, Gwyrddlas a Majenta! Meet the Printing Crew - Yellow, Cyan and Magenta!

programme.desc: Mae Crawc, Dan, Gwich a Pigog yn helpu Pwti i ddod o hyd i wenyn i'w darlunio. Crawc's hiccups ensure that any bees can't get close enough for the crew to either draw them or get honey.

programme.title: New: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, efo disgyblion Ysgol Gymraeg Bro Teyr. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish into something special.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Gwynfryn wedi colli ei glustiau moch coed. Fydd Blero a'i ffrindiau'n gallu dod o hyd iddyn nhw mewn pryd ar gyfer Jamborî ar Rew Ocido? Snowden has lost his pine cone ears, oh no...

programme.title: New: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri yn ymweld á gardd Ysgol Pendalar, bydd Evan ac Idris yn mynd ar daith ystlumod yn y nos, a bydd Huw yn nofio yn y mor gyda Jac. More adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Mae gair heddiw ('llyfr') yn rhywbeth mae'r Cywion Bach yn hoffi ei ddefnyddio pan mae'n amser chwarae ac yn amser ymlacio. Today, Bîp Bîp, Pi Po, Bop and Bw learn the word 'llyfr'!

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae'r ffrindiau bach yn cymharu pethau hir a phethau byr mae nhw wedi darganfod ar y traeth. Today the small friends compare long and short things which they've found on the beach.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Nia yn cael parti merlota gyda Megan o Gwdihw. Today, Nia will be having a riding party with Megan from Gwdihw.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Teifon yn helpu Glenys i dacluso eu cartref. Mae'n dod o hyd i'r lle perffaith i adael eu trugareddau - ty-coeden Cochyn! Teifion finds a novel way of helping Glenys to tidy up.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae'n dawel ar y fferm heddiw - mae'n rhaid bod rhywun ar goll. The farm is quiet today - someone must be missing! Can the 'llyfr pob dim' help Jen and Jim find the missing animal?

programme.title: Sblij a Sbloj
programme.desc: Mae'r ddau ddireidus yn mynd i'r sinema, gan lwyddo i golli'r llythyren 'c' oddi ar yr arwydd! The two little monsters create havoc at the cinema and lose the letter 'c'!

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u byd bach o hud
programme.desc: Mae Mali a Ben yn mynd i lan y môr ac mae Mali yn defnyddio ei phwerau hud - er bod Mistar Coblyn wedi dweud wrthi beidio. Mali joins Ben and his family on an elf trip to the seaside.

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u Byd Bach Hud

programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgolion Llanaelhaearn a Pentruchaf yn ymweld ag Asra yr wythnos hon. Children from schools in Llanaelhaearn and Pentruchaf visit the Asra studio this week.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn yn trefnu noson gwisgo'n ffansi yn y bwyty. Siôn organises a 'glam night' at the restaurant.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Byddwch yn barod am lond bol o chwerthin! Join the crew for more funny and silly sketches! Be ready for a belly full of laughs!

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Pan mae Pili Po yn llwyddo mewn prawf, mae'r Tîm yn tefnu dathliad. When Pili-Po passes an important test, the team organise a po-fect celebration.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Ymunwch gyda Meleri a Huw wrth iddyn nhw grwydro Cymru a chael pob math o antur yn yr awyr agored. Today: a wet and muddy assault course, skateboarding, and the world's fastest zip line.

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: New: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae cynlluniau Lloyd gydag Abacus yn cael eu difetha pan mae rhaid iddo fynd ar daith i Caterpillar World. Lloyd's plans with Abacus are ruined when he goes on a trip to Caterpillar World.

programme.title: MabinOgi-Ogi a Mwy!
programme.desc: Fersiwn bywiog criw Stwnsh o stori Rhys a Meinir. Yr wythnos hon mi fydd yna ymweliad arbennig gan dîm Priodas Pum Mil! Join the Stwnsh team for their take on the story of Rhys a Meinir.

programme.title: New: Boom!
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, bydd y brodyr Bidder yn hedfan ar wifren zip i brofi theorïau Newton a Galileo, a bydd Aled yn dangos sut i greu negeseuon cudd. This time, the Bidder brothers fly on a zipline.

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
programme.desc: Teithia Sue ac Emrys i Abu Dhabi i weld Rod y mab wrth ei waith i'r teulu brenhinol ar yr ynys breifat. Sue and Emrys' son competes in a show with over £10m dirhams prize money up for grabs.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Final weekend of the JD Cymru Premier first phase - there's a three horse race between Caernarfon Town, Pen-y-bont and Haverfordwest County.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae pentre Llan Llon yn gyffro i gyd; mae'r anifeiliaid wedi penderfynu cynnal sioe dalent! Llan Llon village is full of excitement; the animals have decided to host a talent show!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain

programme.title: Pablo

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur

programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: New: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Nel yn gofyn 'Pam bod adar yn trydar?' ac mae Tad-cu'n ateb gyda stori sili ond annwyl iawn am gogydd Eidalaidd o'r enw Vincenzo a'i pizza's anarferol. Nel asks: why do birds tweet?

programme.title: Nos Da Cyw
programme.desc: Sh! Mae'r haul yn mynd i'w wely ac mae'n amser i ni gael stori fach cyn cysgu. Shh! The sun is going to bed so let's have a lovely little bedtime story.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas wrth eu bodd yn chwarae 'jwngl' yn yr ardd. Tybed pwy gaiff ei ddewis i chwilio am air newydd heddiw, 'brwyn'? Who will be chosen to go in search of today's word, 'rushes'?

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Dathliad Eid al Fitr fydd diwrnod mawr Jaleel ac mae'n astudio Arabeg, mynd i'r mosg ac agor ffenestri ei galendr Ramadan i baratoi. Jaleel's big day will be the Eid al Fitr celebration.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Heb i gath flin Mr Puw sylweddoli be' sy'n digwydd mae Guto'n ei defnyddio i ddatrys sefyllfa anodd. Guto enlists the unwitting help of Mr Puw's Cat to get the ducks out of a pickle.

programme.title: Llan-ar-goll-en
programme.desc: Mae Dr Jim yn creu dyfais newydd sbon, camera hunlun, ond cyn iddo gael cyfle i ddangos sut mae'n gweithio, mae'r camera'n diflannu! Dr Jim's new selfie camera disappears. Where is it?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Dringwyr ydy Stiw a Taid yn eu gêm, a mynydd i'w ddringo ydy grisiau'r ty. Stiw and Taid pretend to be mountaineers, and that the stairs are a mountain to climb.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, edrychwn ar anifeiliaid sy'n neidio yn Awstralia, sef y cangarw a'r corryn neidiog. This time, we look at Australia's leaping creatures - the kangaroo and the jumping spider.

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Pam bod yr awyr yn las'? yw cwestiwn Hari i Tad-cu heddiw. 'Why is the sky blue?' is Hari's question to Grandpa today. Then he shares a sorry about King Duly who was bored with a pink sky.

programme.title: Timpo

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
